# Tender Announcement

## Request for Expression of Interest (RFEOI) for Submarine Battery Charger

### Reference Number: ES255458
### Publication Date: August 1, 2023
### Tender Closing Date: August 15, 2023 (17:00:00)

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites general contractors to express their interest in providing all necessary labour, materials, and equipment for the refurbishment of two existing units and supply, delivery, and installation of three new units of a submarine battery charger. This Request for Expression of Interest (RFEOI) is the first step of a two-step solicitation process, with the next step being the Tender Phase.

### Project Background

The project involves the immediate refurbishment of two existing units and the construction of three new units of a load bank battery charger (LBBC). The refurbishment includes diagnostics, assessments, replacement of AC/DC drives, PLC and HMI systems, and commissioning to ensure reliable battery charging capabilities. The construction of new units includes design, manufacture, testing, delivery, and installation of the equipment.

### Key Requirements

* Hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by Public Works and Government Services Canada's (PWGSC) Contract Security Program (CSP)
* Each contractor personnel requires a valid Reliability Status, granted or approved by the CSP/PWGSC
* Compliance with the Access to Information Act (Canada)

### Important Dates

* Tender Phase: August 15, 2023
* Estimated Completion Date: May 14, 2024 (530 calendar days following contract award)

### Additional Information

* Bid security will be required during the Tender Phase
* Language of the tender and contract can be chosen by the contractor
* A joint venture is an association of two or more parties who will bid together for the requirement
* Contractors must have a valid DOS or FSC to be invited to the Tender Phase

### Contact Information

* Danielle Flynn, Coordinator, Contract Services
* danielle.flynn@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
* 778-789-3070

### Closing Location

Responses to this RFEOI must be received through the Electronic Bidding System. Responses sent by fax, mail, or email will not be accepted.

### Closing Date and Time

The closing date and time indicated in the Electronic Submission System will be the official closing date and time of this RFEOI. Bidding and Documents are available on http://www.merx.com
